name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Drake REARDON, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Drake REARDON, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of the Superior Court, insofar as it vacates the order of the trial court and remands for resentencing, is vacated and the judgment of sentence is reinstated. In all other respects the order is affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Samuels, 516 Pa. 300, 304 n. 4, 532 A.2d 404, 406 n. 4 (1987).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
552 A.2d 248
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Drake REARDON, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 10, 1989.
